pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Robust Generalized Mixed Models for Longitudinal Data // To perform model estimation using MCMC algorithms with Bayesian methods for incomplete longitudinal studies on binary outcomes that are measured repeatedly on subjects over time with drop- outs. Details about the method can be found in the vignette or https://sites.google.com/view/kuojunglee/r-packages/bayesrgmm.
